H0.text: George W Bush was given which diminutive herbaceous nickname. Sprout

H1.text: George W Bush was given which diminutive herbaceous nickname. Bushy

H2.text: George W Bush was given which diminutive herbaceous nickname. Twig

H3.text: George W Bush was given which diminutive herbaceous nickname. Shrub

A4.text: A shrub or bush is a small to medium-sized perennial woody plant.

A5.text: Unlike herbaceous plants, shrubs have persistent woody stems above the ground.

A6.text: Marked with * can also develop into tree form if in ideal conditions.
